qas.question: What are some famous seafood and fish dishes?

answers.text: squid, octopus, red mullet, and sea bass

qas.question: What fruits are commonly used in foods?

answers.text: pork and chicken cooked over charcoal

context: Seafood and fish dishes include <a0_0>squid, octopus, red mullet, and sea bass<a0_0/>. <a1_0>Cucumber and tomato<a1_0/> are used widely in salads. Common vegetable preparations include potatoes in olive oil and parsley, pickled cauliflower and beets, asparagus and taro. Other traditional delicacies of are meat marinated in dried coriander seeds and wine, and eventually dried and smoked, such as lountza (<a2_0>smoked pork loin<a2_0/>), charcoal-grilled lamb, souvlaki (<a3_0>pork and chicken cooked over charcoal<a3_0/>), and sheftalia (<a4_0>minced meat wrapped in mesentery<a4_0/>). Pourgouri (bulgur, cracked wheat) is the traditional source of carbohydrate other than bread, and is used to make the delicacy koubes.
